original: <color=#fff999>$leader1</color>膽敢拒絕本王招募，日後要使其下跪求饒，悔不當初！(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> dare to refuse the recruitment of this king, and make him kneel and beg for mercy in the future, and regret not in the beginning! (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
